description: - 780 meticulously rated, NHL players for the regular season. - All of the off-season trades and acquisitions. - Player ratings based on last season statistics, and this seasons projections. - 26 man rosters. 15 forwards, 8 defensemen, and 3 goalies. - Line configurations for the regular season. [Left Wing Lock] - Team rating projections for the regular season: home ice advantage - (home PTS %), road warrior rating (away PTS %), special teams (PP% – - PPGF, and PK% – PKGAA), offensive prowess (GF/G and GF), defensive - stoutness (GAA) [EARE]. - New control read method. Goalie control is now mapped to the (Y) button. Controls must be calibrated to the 6 button configuration to use this feature. [SpritesMind] - Refined system that narrows attribute increments for more accurate player ratings. - NHL14 splash screens. - NHL14 logo for the Zamboni and team selection. - NHL14 timer logo. - Player card portraits for every skater and goalie. - Updated uniform palette, two separate swatches for lids and a hue for pin stripes. - Remastered sprite fields with updated skater and goalie sprites. [Sprite Patch] - 2013-14 Uniforms [HUDB]. - Trapezoid crease and improved nets. - New font. - Checking – speed burst multiplier adjustment. - Adjusted fatigue meters. - Hot – cold fix. - Weight bug fix. - Assist bug fix. - Puck-drop organ tunes have been matched to the correct teams - A longer, louder, different sounding goal horn that more closely resembles the ones used in current NHL arenas [YT].
